Hannah Chang

Hi there and welcome to my website! My name is Hannah Chang and I am a senior studying at the University of Michigan's College of Engineering. I'm majoring in computer science, with a minor in digital studies.

Upon graduating in May 2024, I'll be joining Palantir as a Software Engineer in Washington, DC.
